data: Whether it is an island in the South Seas or a great city, the spell of oneâ€™s homeland holds, and the sight of homeland face, when far afield, can work wonders in the human heart, as Tauti and Uliami lived to learn.
H. De Vere (Henry De Vere) Stacpoole
